team.mateo.name: Mateo Bodenlle
team.mateo.description: Drives OSIX's financial vision and growth strategy. With a sharp eye for opportunity and risk, Mateo leads fundraising efforts, financial planning, and long-term sustainability to ensure each step the company takes is strategically sound.
team.juan.name: Juan Freire
team.juan.description: Designs and implements the backbone of our systems. Juan is an expert in high-performance APIs, database optimization, and backend scalability, ensuring OSIX's platforms are as solid as they are flexible.
team.guti.name: David GutiÃ©rrez
team.guti.description: Merges cybersecurity best practices with advanced AI integration. David thrives in high-pressure environments, building secure backend systems and deploying AI-powered solutions that handle real-world complexity with elegance.
team.pazos.name: Pablo Pazos
team.pazos.description: Defines the technical direction and system architecture behind OSIX. As CTO, Pazos leads the team toward clean, modular, and scalable solutions, balancing long-term strategy with day-to-day decision-making across all tech fronts.
team.nico.name: NicolÃ¡s Corbal
team.nico.description: Crafts intuitive, pixel-perfect user interfaces. Nico transforms complex functionality into sleek, interactive experiences, leveraging the latest frontend technologies to create smooth and engaging user journeys.
team.nel.name: David M. Raposeiras
team.nel.description: Automates, monitors, and secures the backbone of OSIX's infrastructure. David ensures that deployments are fast, environments are resilient, and systems stay online â€” always with security and performance in mind.
team.diego.name: Diego CristÃ³bal
team.diego.description: Bridges mobile and web development with a unified approach. Diego builds consistent, high-quality user experiences across platforms, using full-stack capabilities to deliver features with speed and precision.

bento.subtitle: We merge intelligent software and automated processes to build the technology of tomorrow.
bento.narrative.title: Origin, Vision & Ambition
bento.narrative.text: OSIX Tech was founded by a new generation of engineers driven to redefine what technology can achieve. Born from a shared belief that true progress comes from uniting bold vision with technical excellence, our ambition is to build the backbone of tomorrowâ€™s most autonomous businesses. We create intelligent, secure systems that empower organizations to operate smarter, faster, and with greater impact. We donâ€™t just adapt to the future, we shape it with intention, delivering solutions that earn trust and create long-term impact for both clients and investors.
bento.cards.ai_assistant.title: Intelligent Assistants
bento.cards.ai_assistant.back_text: We develop custom AI assistants that automate tasks, integrate with your systems, and optimize workflows to unlock your team's potential.

bento.cards.cybersecurity.title: AI-Driven Systems
bento.cards.cybersecurity.back_text: We specialize in integrating advanced AI into real business processes. From intelligent assistants to predictive analytics and language models, we embed AI capabilities into your systems to unlock new levels of intelligence, automation, personalization, and operational efficiency.
bento.cards.automation.title: Process Automation
bento.cards.automation.back_text: We design and implement complete process automation solutions. From internal operations to customer-facing workflows, we help companies eliminate repetitive tasks, reduce human error, save time, and focus their teams on high-impact, value-generating activities.

kted.hero.title: Up to â‚¬30,000 to integrate your company into Data Spaces
kted.hero.subtitle: 100% grant funding. You only pay VAT. We handle everything.
kted.whatIs.title: What is the Data Spaces Kit?
kted.whatIs.text: KTED is a Spanish Government program through Red.es, funded by NextGenerationEU. Its goal is to integrate companies and public administrations into European sectoral data spaces, enabling secure and controlled data sharing.
kted.amounts.title: How much can you get?
kted.amounts.subtitle: Amounts vary based on entity type and role in the data space

kted.amounts.aapp.participante.label: Participant
kted.amounts.aapp.proveedor.label: Provider
kted.process.title: How does it work?
kted.process.subtitle: We guide you through the entire process, from application to justification
kted.process.step1.title: Contact us
kted.process.step1.desc: We evaluate your case with no commitment and verify your eligibility
kted.process.step2.title: Choose the data space
kted.process.step2.desc: We identify the best fit for your sector and needs
kted.process.step3.title: Prepare the application
kted.process.step3.desc: Technical report, administrative documentation, everything ready
kted.process.step4.title: Execute the project
kted.process.step4.desc: Technical integration with the chosen data space
kted.process.step5.title: Justify and collect
kted.process.step5.desc: Red.es pays us directly. You only pay the VAT
kted.whyOsix.title: Why choose OSIX?
kted.whyOsix.subtitle: We make accessing the grant easy and risk-free
kted.whyOsix.card1.title: No financial risk
kted.whyOsix.card1.desc: You only pay VAT. Red.es pays us directly.
kted.whyOsix.card2.title: Full management
kted.whyOsix.card2.desc: We handle the application, execution, and complete justification.
kted.whyOsix.card3.title: AI and data specialists
kted.whyOsix.card3.desc: Nessie, our platform, already works with European data spaces.
kted.whyOsix.card4.title: Local company
kted.whyOsix.card4.desc: Based in Santiago, we speak your language and know the local business ecosystem.
kted.sectors.title: Eligible sectors
kted.sectors.subtitle: Data spaces cover multiple strategic sectors
kted.sectors.note: Don't see your sector? Contact us, there are more data spaces available.
kted.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
kted.faq.q1: Do I have to advance any money?
kted.faq.a1: No. You only pay the VAT on our services. We collect the subsidy directly from Red.es.
kted.faq.q2: How long does the process take?
kted.faq.a2: From application to execution, between 2-4 months depending on complexity.
kted.faq.q3: What if I don't get the grant?
kted.faq.a3: It's non-competitive: if you meet the requirements and funds are available, you get it. We verify your eligibility before starting.
kted.faq.a4: It's a secure ecosystem where companies share data in a controlled way. Example: agrifood production data for traceability.
kted.faq.a5: The deadline is March 31, 2026, but funds are allocated on a first-come, first-served basis.
kted.contact.title: Want to know if your company can benefit?
kted.contact.subtitle: We'll contact you within 24h to evaluate your case with no commitment
